description: Suggests interview after plan file creation and spec review before session end

hooks.prompt: Check if the file just written matches *plan*.md or *-plan.md pattern (but NOT *-spec.md). If it appears to be a project/feature plan document, suggest: 'This looks like a plan file. Would you like me to run `/plan-interview:interview [filepath]` to generate a detailed specification through an interview process?' Be contextually aware - only suggest once per file, and don't suggest if user is clearly doing something else.

If a specification file (*-spec.md) was generated during this session and the spec-reviewer agent was NOT already run, offer: 'A specification was generated this session. Would you like me to run a quality review before we wrap up?' Only offer once, respect user's decision.
